title.rendered: Build a Direct to Consumer Brand with Matt Edmundson

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:50 — 35.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:50 — 35.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Matt Edmundson is an eCommerce coach and mentor for direct-to-consumer sites making sure they are targeting the right customers on their market.

Check out more here: https://www.amazingfba.com/edmundson

You’ll Learn:

  • How to build a repeat business
  • How to do customer service the right way
  • How to avoid the old clunky system
  • To buy from your competitors and learn what the buying experience is
  • How to make your website as engaging as possible
  • Where your target market is and meet them there
